name: surfwright
description: Agent-first browser control surface (CLI + daemon) for Chrome/Chromium

scripts.contract:snapshot:update: pnpm -s build && node scripts/checks/contract-snapshot.mjs --update && pnpm -s contract:fingerprint:sync
scripts.skill:doctor: pnpm -s build && node dist/cli.js skill doctor
scripts.skill:update: pnpm -s build && node dist/cli.js skill update --source ./skills/surfwright --lock ./skills/surfwright.lock.json
scripts.validate: pnpm -s typecheck && pnpm -s policy:check && pnpm -s perf:check && pnpm -s changelog:check && pnpm -s skill:validate && pnpm -s build && pnpm -s startup-envelope:check && pnpm -s contract:snapshot:check && pnpm -s knowledge-store:check
scripts.validate:strict: pnpm -s typecheck && pnpm -s policy:check:strict && pnpm -s perf:check && pnpm -s changelog:check && pnpm -s skill:validate && pnpm -s build && pnpm -s startup-envelope:check && pnpm -s contract:snapshot:check && pnpm -s knowledge-store:check
scripts.test: pnpm -s test:contract && pnpm -s test:fixtures && pnpm -s test:skill-lifecycle && pnpm -s test:update-lifecycle && pnpm -s test:release-scripts
